setting: Set within the ruins of a once-legendary academy for magicians, the dungeon's walls are lined with the echoes of ancient knowledge and the secrets of an era long past. The academy has been abandoned for centuries, and the halls are now teeming with an aura of forgotten spells and whispers of a great mystery.
mystery: The mystery revolves around the lost knowledge of an ancient spell believed to grant limitless power to its caster. The academy was overrun by dark forces, and the spell was hidden away in pieces, each entrusted to different beings who now guard the academy.
final_prize: The final prize is the ancient spell grimoire that holds the coveted knowledge of immortality and ultimate arcane power.

character.name: Elaria Nightshade
character.role: Former student and compatriot of the academy's last headmaster.
character.key_interaction: Elaria will reveal the spell's name and teach the player a greeting in the ancient language to be used in further diplomacy with the next guardians.

character.name: Gorath the Wise
character.role: Once a mentor turned guardian of the second piece of the spell.
character.key_interaction: Gorath demands to know what Elaria taught the player and seeks confirmation of the player's pure intent to guard the spell's secret.

character.name: Farael the Deceiver
character.role: Herald once entrusted to protect a pivotal component of the spell under deceit.
character.key_interaction: Players must decipher his riddles and prove they learned from Gorath about protecting the academy's essence.

character.name: Lyra Starshard
character.role: A temporal mage who secured a piece of the spell with time magic.
character.key_interaction: Lyra requires a tale from the past exchangesâ€”the player must correctly recount the purpose of each guardian to have any hope of advancing.

character.name: Zephyrus the Keeper
character.role: The ultimate protector of the academy's secrets and final gatekeeper.
character.key_interaction: To earn the final key, Zephyrus demands that the player reconstruct the true history of the academy, piecing together insights given by all previous characters.
